content: With that in mind, do you best to dodge his wing attacks after he extends them slightly, and unleash everything you've got in your arsenal to try burning down that 10%.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Boss Fight - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
With that in mind, do you best to dodge his wing attacks after he extends them slightly, and unleash everything you've got in your arsenal to try burning down that 10%.
